title.narrative: Strengthening Institutional Capacity and Management of the Education System

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to strengthen the institutional capacity of the Ministry of National Education and Vocational Training for improved management of the education system.

condition.narrative: The Recipient agrees that the MOP shall have been amended to include details with respect to Section A.1(ii)(d) in Part A ofSchedule 1 and Section I.A.2 of Schedule 2 of the Financing Agreement, in a manner satisfactory to the Association, not later thantwo (2) months after the date of countersignature of the amendment letter.

title.narrative: Timely production and dissemination of quarterly and annual reports on school performance
Total number of students using new computer rooms in Hodan 3 middle school

actual.value: The survey of textbooks at beginning and end of school year 2017/18 has taken place

title.narrative: The level of satisfaction of TVET students and firms

target.value: Progress of at least 10% (compared to baseline) at the end of the project
